body.p: ANDERSON, SAMUEL, Private, Co. E, 11th Pennsylvania, aged 18 years. Wilderness, May 6th, 1864. Frontal fractured by conoidal ball. Mount Pleasant Hospital, Washington. In May, fragments of both tables removed. Duty, August 20th, 1864.
